subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Usain Bolt played to the cameras before his 200-meter semifinal and slowed down before it was over — the usual drill for a sprinter who doesn’t look like he can be beaten.
snippet: Usain Bolt played to the cameras before his 200-meter semifinal and slowed down before it was over — the usual drill for a sprinter who doesn’t look like he can be beaten.
